CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install wget unzip -y &&     export PLUGINS_DIR=/usr/lib/rabbitmq/lib/rabbitmq_server-$RABBITMQ_VERSION/plugins &&     wget https://dl.bintray.com/rabbitmq/community-plugins/3.7.x/rabbitmq_delayed_message_exchange/rabbitmq_delayed_message_exchange-20171201-3.7.x.zip --directory-prefix=$PLUGINS_DIR &&     unzip $PLUGINS_DIR/rabbitmq_delayed_message_exchange-20171201-3.7.x.zip -d $PLUGINS_DIR &&     chown rabbitmq $PLUGINS_DIR/rabbitmq_delayed_message_exchange-20171201-3.7.x.ez &&     rabbitmq-plugins enable --offline rabbitmq_delayed_message_exchange
Commands.Name: run
